awd_titl_txt: The Tenth Dissertations Symposium on Chemical Oceanography
awd_abstract_narration: The Tenth Dissertations Symposium on Chemical Oceanography                      (DISCO) will be held November 18-23, 1991 at the East-West                      Center, University of Hawaii campus, Honolulu, Hawaii.  Twenty-                 six chemical oceanography candidates will meet for five days in                 formal and informal sessions to present their theses                            dissertations, contribute to discussions, participate in                        working groups, and meet with other attendees and sponsors to                   discuss their work and future activities.  The sponsors will                    delineate the federal government programs in chemical                           oceanography and present avenues of support.  The proceedings                   will be published.  This will be the tenth in a series of                       symposia supported by the National Science Foundation (NSF),                    Office of Naval Research (ONR), and the National Oceanic and                    Atmospheric Administration (NOAA).

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF BIOLOGICAL SCIENCES, INC.
